title: Guess what, the world DOESNT REVOLVE AROUND YOU! Get OVER YOURSELF.
body:
Seriously, I  just lost a ranked match because I (as a support, Zilean to be exact)  accidentally killed 3 minions with Q. Bomb exploded, minions died. ADC COMPLETELY LOSES IT! 
Has a complete temper tantrum at spawn, then proceeds to intentionally feed because she "is making 5 people happy, and 4 people unhappy"

again, all this because the support accidentally took 3 minions. 
Seriously, If you are this much of a diva, expecting everyone to play how you want and completely losing your mind when people dont play how YOU want them to...then get off ranked and go take your narcissistic "All about  me" attitude back to Bots, there  you can boss around your team as much as you want. But if you are going to feed because someone didnt give you the role/champ you wanted. someone took too many cs from you out of ONE wave. Or didnt immediately come running at your beck and call. Then get over yourself and get off a team based game

This game is where there are 5 people working as ONE UNIT. Not as 5 players. So I (as a support) Really have no patience for adcs or teammates with a high and mighty "better than thou" attitude. Your constant demands that people play how YOU want, or that people play to YOUR standards. really serve as a source of frustration and division. 

Seriously, If all you care about is yourself, Please remove yourself from a team based game!
and get over yourself.

replies.body: Yeah but is your rant going to accomplish anything?

> [{quoted}](name=JetstreamSetsuna,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=r27qm9Ne,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-09T14:13:42.419+0000)
>
> Yeah but is your rant going to accomplish anything?

Maybe not, but with upvotes and the combined people of love, we can and will make this community a better place for all.

Or someone will come on here, say exactly why people get so pissy about stuff like that, and then everyone will shun him.

> [{quoted}](name=Dharc Kaisor,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=r27qm9Ne,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-11-09T14:33:18.398+0000)
>
> Maybe not, but with upvotes and the combined people of love, we can and will make this community a better place for all.
> 
> Or someone will come on here, say exactly why people get so pissy about stuff like that, and then everyone will shun him.


I knew someone who was a very nice person irl, you would not expect him to rage, but when I played with him he afk'd because the support took a few cs.  He knows he shouldn't be like that, he's had multiple bans, but he was still like that.  I hadn't seen him in a year, then all of sudden when I saw him and played with him again, he wasn't like that anymore.  Something in his brain must've clicked and he matured.  

I don't know what changed him, but bans and people posting these things probably wasn't the thing to do it because he knew what he was doing was wrong long before he stopped being that way.

When people have to vent, they have to vent whether it be about the game or real life problems.

Screaming when you are in pain may not solve anything, but it makes you feel better.
Venting on how difficult a college / university course may not make it easier, but it makes people feel better.

If someone is sad / angry / depressed etc. talking to someone (or something) about their problems makes them feel better, it won't accomplish much, but it can calm the person down a bit, and no I am not saying if someone is on tilt they should rage at their team mates or anything along those lines, so don't get it twisted.
Better to rant here after the game is over than to rant in-game at one's teammates.

There is the old saying "The squeaky wheel gets the grease"
Maybe it will get riot's attention and they will do something. Like they did with the old PSA they made "Teamwork OP"
Its about drawing attention to a problem in the community to fix it, rather than just shouting down the opinion and sweeping the 'problem' under the rug.

Alot of players are getting verbally abusive and disrespectful to their teammates, holding this attitude that they are somehow better or "superior" to other teammates because of a particular role. 
as I stated. I could make a perfectly valid observation, or make a reasonable suggestion and it will be shouted down/dismissed and I get flamed because I am just the support, which isnt focused on kills, so isnt as important as the other roles. 

Often they will try and invalidate my opinion by regurgitating my KDA back to me "Stfu ur 0/X/X" as If the weight of my opinion, the validity of my point depends on how many kills I score.  No kills? Your opinion isnt even worth the time it took for me to look at it"
again, all because I am a support.

Interestingly, most people in bot games, at worst, are completely silent. As one of those players with over 2000 bot games under my belt, I've actually only seen about five or so of "those guys" in the queue. It's weird.
Same. Although i did see a nasus rage at a zed for taking "his kills" once. In the early game. They were laning together. Let that sink in.
Why would you expect people to get stressed in bot games?  They are virtually impossible to lose so no one cares if allies make mistakes.  I do see way more complaints about KSing in them though.

Yeah it really irritates me when someone complains about KSing on a team game.
Its basically saying "All kills are MINE by default. Maybe if I like you I will let you have one or two of them"

 I mean you dont see this happening in LCS. You dont see them fighting and complaining about who had thier name on a kill. Why? Because its a TEAM game, and they are working as a TEAM to WIN AS A TEAM.

Not win a "Who has the most kills" contest.

I never give a care who gets kills in lane, even as adc. If we kill their adc I get 2+ waves of free farm which will outweigh the gold of the kill anyway. Yeah the extra 150-200 gold would have been nice but chances are...I wouldn't have been able to buy much with it anyway since BF+longsword/pink would have taken up a majority of my money anyway.

YOU KNOW WHAT'S UP

I play a lot of poke and damage-oriented supports (Karma, Sona, Nami) and nothing infuriates me more than getting a sick kill on both enemy laners, watching my ADC stand there not CSing and then see a rant about how I "stole" a kill. Excuse me, slowing them with E and then hitting a bubble to set you up and then accidentally taking the kill with an AA is not "stealing". Did you set that up without me? My abilities just don't exist, huh. Neither does assist gold. Or lane dominance.
Agreed.  Unless you have a {{champion:119}}  on your team it's better to make sure the enemy dies than to worry about not ksing and risk leting them get away.

I was playing Bots with a friend of mine once, just as they were starting to learn league. We go in to lane bot together, cause it's a bot game, who cares? This AD TF starts raging at my friend and I, saying he's going bot ADC no matter what. So we say "okay" go top instead.

Rages at me for the first 5 minutes of the game, for going Sona top to support my friend. Starts calling us bronze, and all this other shit. 

Finally I get fed up with his bull shit. Sell my items, get a BF sword and some Zerker boots. Go bot and "support" him since he's being such a baby about it. This guy can't CS to save his life. I go ham and get literally every minion from him. He still keeps raging. Finally starts feeding, like that'll make a difference. He gets the bots bounties high enough to where killing them is a nice chunk of gold. We still win, and he just rages until the end.

Honestly some people are just divas no matter the mode.

shoulda posted
 her screen name here so we know not o play with her.
While that may seem like a good idea to you, it's actually against the terms and conditions of the boards. For future reference, naming other specific summoners (aka players) is not allowed.

If the sup takes 3cs get over it

but if someone keeps on taking to much of your cs
your not effectively playing as a team

3cs is litteretly nothing
You'll miss more by waiting for IE at fountain.

yeah I have had people lose thier minds over killing ONE minion. 
OMG u Retard stop taking all My CS! 
"But I only killed one.."
OMG REPORT THIS TROLL, Killstealing, assisting enemy team! OMFG so bad support

and these people expect us to be able to keep them alive and healthy.
then get mad at us for reacting when they throw childish tantrums over the death of ONE MINION
I'm sure he missed four while he was typing.

Ahh but the funny thing is these are the same types of people who will 

-say something completely stupid, or make a false accusation. 
-wait till you are forced to refute the accusation or deny it
-then claim you are "afk/idle" because you had to stand still for 5 seconds to respond. 
-completely dismiss the idea that you cannot effectively play and type at the same time (either have to play the game or stop momentarily to type. Basically creating a no-win scenario) Either stop and deny the false accusation and be accused of going "afk" or keep playing and let them continue to slander you with false accusations and labels...and something which most likely the other team will believe (if we are being honest)

a couple cs is no biggie..but when they start just pushing the wave and doing unnecessary damage to the minions that makes me miss 10-20 cs before my first back...i tend to get a little pissy, especially when they arent getting the cs either, so the gold was just shat on and thrown out into the trash pile. but even then i give a kind nudge and ask them to not push the wave and ensure the "lol" is in there somewhere so they know im not raging...if they keep being a moron, then i get upset.

yeah there is a difference between giving a friendly heads up to be more careful....
...and throwing a full on tantrum because support got a few cs. 
If I remmeber correctly, she also got ragey at the jungler for taking a few cs for the "gank tax"

Always pay your gank taxes...if you want your ganks.

Then there's that mid lane Azir that tries to solo drag at level 4, gets mad at you for not helping him, then proceeds to intentionally feed the entire game. Mind you, I was busy get bot lane a double kill while this happened, who, to repay the favor, decided to flame me all game because I made a comment that "teamwork is seen in the LCS, we can try to follow that example."

This is why I hate ranked.

Yeah well, League is Becoming less and less team oriented. 
I mean I am seeing it more and more when a player on the enemy team gets rekt, they will come back with 
"Had to 2/3v1 me, how sad"
Yes, I worked together with my TEAM to take down an opponent.
"that's why u suk, you cant 1v1"

and they get completely angry with me when I remind them league is a TEAM BASED GAME. 
which seems to further set them off. 
Yeah how dare a game be something other than an "Every player for themselves" brag-match where 5 players on the same team have to stab each other in the back and sabotage their own team so they can brag "Im the best, look at my trash team"

Just makes me want to pull my hair out.
If people want 1v1 and to play the "I'm the best" game. Get off a team game and go play Call of duty with the rest of the spoiled brats. Leave the team games to those of us who want to win, not fight over who has the most kills or help contribute to some kid's already over-inflated narcissism

I main Supp and these ADC's make me sick. I was playing {{champion:54}}  Jg last night just to hang out with a buddy that plays {{champion:157}} 
So i politely ask for a leash at gromp from bot. to which they ignored me. so i pinged assistance and still no response. so after getting my Yas buddy to help me out with gromp. I ask bot why they didnt leash, they said they didnt care. they then began feeding all the lanes until the enemy won. I have it all on video with the chat and everything, should i send it in?
Absolutely. Why wouldn't you send it in?
I think people like that should be punished and exposed as a bad example to others

Yeah, JUST got out of a support match where adc raged at me for killing a minion...WITH RELIC SHIELD ON. 
I told him I had relic shield 
his response: "So?"
Obviously that ADC doesn't know what a relic shield is.

> [{quoted}](name=ARoninInDisgrace,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=r27qm9Ne,comment-id=00310000,timestamp=2016-01-12T16:40:55.462+0000)
>
> Obviously that ADC doesn't know what a relic shield is.

Sadly becoming more and more common
sounds like a silver adc.
but my mommy said that im a special little snowflake

You have 3 types of ADCs.

1. The ADCs that ragequitt over anything. If you take CS accidently or get a kill because they failed to secure
2. The ADCs that keep blaming their support for not helping/sucking
3. ADCs that are actually nice

ADC #3 seems to be becoming more and More rare. 

I am a support and I seem to get alot more needless abuse.  I mean You can have adcs 1 and 2. I am noticing alot more adcs willing to throw all the blame on the support.
Had a game where My adc had about 5% health left (or less, it was a sliver of health anyways). I was oom so I had been recalling.
He runs in, tries to score a double off a FULL HEALTH ADC AND SUPPORT. Dies (of course)
Proceeds to Blame me as his support for not being there to keep him alive (I was oom and at base at the time)

I love getting harassed by adcs that think they are able to 1v2. I clearly state I am backing every time I do bot lane and say try not to die. I was oom as Brand on PBE and had enough to almost straight up buy my frostfang+sightstone item (could get ruby+frostfang) so I said hey I am recalling play safe. He proceeds to push the wave by auto attacking (while it was already on their side so it was a good time for me to back anyway) and then gets thresh hooked under turret and dies and it was my fault. "I'm Kog'maw its your job to let me farm and protect me." I am also brand with 0 mana who can't protect you outside of throwing aas at them to "try" to deter them off you. I asked why he stayed and didn't back with me and he said "I didn't have enough money" when he bought a cutlass and a dagger/boots (I don't remember which) on recall which was approx 2000 gold banked up. We were under their tower and you had 2k gold and thought it wasn't a good time to back with me? Not my fault your judgment is poor and you decided to die for it.

I prefer the term hissy fit, over temper tantrum.

I used to main adc. I still play it some, but I can't handle playing in that lane.. Not because I was the toxic ADC, but because people have this preconceived idea that adcs are toxic, and deliberately make my life hell.

I go further, I refer to it as a shit-fit (pardon the language lol)
I just use temper tantrum to paint a more accurate picture
these players dont get thier way, dont get the role THEY wanted.
Players dont play to the level THEY had set for thier team. 
Everything isnt just handed to them or heaven forbid the match actually turns out to have a bit of a challenge to it. 
Nah, they just sit at base and have a tantrum, flaming thier teammates, talking about how they dont "deserve to be stuck with these bronzies" or how "Im a gold 2" (or some other higher teir)

I am a support main, My goal is to help my team get fed, to help my team win as much as I can
I am not there to be the adc's personal verbal punching bag and doormat when the match doesnt go exactly how they wanted it to and they need someone to take out thier salt on.

Typical ADC main. Only mains who can get away with that shit because  you need them on your team.

This is why I am tired of every meta revolving around ADC. If your ADC is some shithead then you can't take towers and you end up losing regardless of how well you did.
but i am the prodigal sun {{champion:89}}

> [{quoted}](name=Damagefox,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=r27qm9Ne,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-11-09T13:09:32.347+0000)

Your constant demands that people play how YOU want, or that people play to YOUR standards. really serve as a source of frustration and division. 
> 
> Seriously, If all you care about is yourself, Please remove yourself from a team based game!
> and get over yourself.

{{champion:26}} is Op @ the moment otherwise "Deal with it" with your fellow teens on this game.
Who says I am a teen?

When time I was Shaco jungle and was setting up my boxes and the enemy invaded river, I didn't engage and kept placing boxes, Kalista and blitzcrank decided to engage. Kalista attacked And died instantly. Blitz ran up to me and blue spawns and the stole one of the small sentinels, I said " why did you do that " and he responded " because you didn't help us " then I went to wolves and he stole the wolves with a hook. He proceeded to follow me through the jungle for 10 minutes stealing my things. And his friend Kalista every now and then would try to. In fact I was recalling near red and Kalista attacked it and made it kill me. Thankfully I was with my two other friends so they understood what was happening, but the sad thing is that they made the other team report me and I got a message after the game that I had negative attitude. Blitz told a bunch of lies about me and these two toxic players are still unbanned. Riot really needs to step up and start banning players that deserve to be banned. Not ones that say " lol get rekt scrub so trash " and get two weeks for toxic. No. The ones that actually go out of their way to ruin your game would be. Step up riot. Step. Up.

> [{quoted}](name=Damagefox,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=r27qm9Ne,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-11-09T13:09:32.347+0000)

Then get over yourself and get off a team based game
> 
> This game is where there are 5 people working as ONE UNIT. Not as 5 players. So I (as a support) Really have no patience for adcs or teammates with a high and mighty "better than thou" attitude. Your constant demands that people play how YOU want, or that people play to YOUR standards. really serve as a source of frustration and division. 
> 
> Seriously, If all you care about is yourself, Please remove yourself from a team based game!
> and get over yourself.

K now for the otherside of the story. You picked zilean because you were pissed you had to support, you intentionly bomb every wave you can in hopes of grabbing CS all under the guise of "harassing the enemy", you build 100% ap and rarely if ever ward. The old I am too good to support so ill play some AP and disguise myself as support but really i am just going to try to carry as a support ap.

you like average 50 cs as support, you always have ignite, mostly build ap, die constantly have a 30% win rate with like 60 games as support zilean but yes keep pretending it isnt you....

Its so cute how you -think- you know me. You think you know everything about Why I play a champ. Why I build what I do. What my strategies are. 
Oh yes, some random person on the internet looked at random numbers and now knows me and my intentions better than I do. 

and "mostly builds ap?" 
WOW who would have thought. I play a champ who's abilities do MAGIC DAMAGE so I build AP. Its soooo cute the way you are trying to make it out like logic is such a bad thing. 
If a champ does PHYSICAL DAMAGE...I build AD
If a champ does MAGIC DAMAGE....I build AP
If a champ does a little of both. I Build BOTH.

You really have no clue why I play the champs I do, Why I choose to play support, or the strategies I am trying to set up, so please stop trying to make these false reasonings for my actions. 
Thank you and have a nice day. 
You know NOTHING about me.

The irony of this is that it then assumes that your issues over-ride his, putting you at the center of everything.

Not saying the guy reacted right, but then yelling about him reacting that way and saying he had no right to will put the center around you and believing him to have to abide by your rulings.

While that's not necessarily a wrong thing to do (sometimes you know better, they don't), but there's inherent hypocrisy in crying about them being self-conceited while being self-conceited.

#bronzeVproblems

also that "making 5 people happy and 4 people unhappy" thing was hilarious. +1 to the troll
Wait...i didnt think my ex wife played league{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
I love how this topic has people yelling like something other than bragging rights are at stake. Some people are funny AF.

In the latest instant of ADC Diva A$$-hattery, I got saddled with an adc who expected the support (zilean) to have control of WHEN his bombs go off. 
I throw a bomb, she (ADC Vayne) takes a few chunks out but is unable to finish off the voli. Bomb is still stuck to him as she gives up and he dashes away. Timebomb goes off, Voli goes pop. Zilean (Me) gets the kill, and ADC proceeds to lose her mind over how I am "stealing her kills". I told her I cant control when the bomb goes off. I wasnt trying to take the kill, she just happened to chunk down voli enough (before giving up and running back to tower) that the Q was able to finish voli off. She acts like I had timed it that way or had somehow magically been able to control the Q detonation. 

But that doesnt matter, she proceeds to rage, insult, and flame me, then declares she is gonna feed because I chose not to be her verbal doormat and went to help Mid. we won despite her feeding. But just another case of Entitled Diva ADCs having a fit because things arent going thier way or something happens that they (or anyone else) can controll. 

I am 1-1 in my series but hesitant to finish it off. For fear I will get another player like this (but wont be so lucky) and once again Lose series #11 (lost 10 promos in a row thanks to these players) 
(My first loss was from a 5v2, Our jungler quit because..I dunno, we didnt run to help him fast enough so he pulled a "No help? Ok Bye" move and quit, Mid just quit midway into the game, and the 3rd player quit a little later because...had to go to school or something)
